mapper.insert: insert into TypeofMeeting (t_id, t_name, status, t_remarks, t_sort) values (#{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tSort,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update TypeofMeeting set status=#{status} where t_id=#{t_id}
select t_id,t_name from TypeofMeeting where status like concat('%',#{ status},'%')
update TypeofMeeting set t_sort=#{t_sort} where t_id=#{t_id}
mapper.select: select t_id, t_name, status, t_remarks, t_sort from TypeofMeeting
select * from TypeofMeeting where t_name like concat('%',#{ t_name},'%')
select count(*) from TypeofMeeting where status like concat('%',#{ status},'%')
